mapper.insert: insert into user (userid, password, username, nickname, email, phonenumber, postcode, address1, address2, birthday, sex, role, regDate) values (#{userid},#{password}, #{username}, #{nickname},#{email},#{phonenumber}, #{postcode},#{address1},#{address2},#{birthday},#{sex},'USER',now())
mapper.select: select * from user where userid=#{userid} and password=#{password}
